alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Schenectady; Northern Saratoga; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 22 at 4:05PM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Saratoga, eastern Albany, western Rensselaer, eastern Schenectady, and southern Washington Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates between a half inch and one inch per hour are possible tonight into Monday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Albany; Eastern Schenectady; Northern Saratoga; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Rensselaer
